culturalContext.description: As the opening phrase, this establishes the song's emotional tone and invites audience engagement.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Opening phrases in Vietnamese folk songs often use vocatives (ơi, này) to grab attention before the narrative begins
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
culturalContext.musicalContext: The 4-syllable structure is the foundational unit of Vietnamese poetic meter (equivalent to 4/4 time in Western music). As the opening phrase, it establishes the tonal center and introduces the melodic motif that will be varied throughout.

phrases.text: Tôi pở ngoại đôông Ngó bao tính khướng rướng tâm nhá ôông Pên clước nhá ôông có dặn cặt câu
phrases.english: I/subject pở [?] ngoại [?] đôông [?] (name: Ngó) how many/much calculate/character (exclamation) (particle) heart/mind (particle) ôông [?] (name: Pên) (particle) (particle) ôông [?] have/there is instruct cut sentence/word

culturalContext.description: This narrative phrase contributes to the song's narrative structure and emotional arc, typical of Northern folk traditions.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
Đàn tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are 20th century innovations - originals were vocal

culturalContext.musicalContext: Exclamatory phrases often use sustained notes or melismatic ornaments (grace notes, bends) to heighten emotional intensity.

culturalContext.description: "Bà" is a respectful address for married women, used even for young women in folk songs. This reflects Confucian social hierarchy maintained even in intimate artistic contexts.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
Đàn tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are 20th century innovations - originals were vocal

culturalContext.musicalContext: The 6-syllable structure (song lục) balances melody with text, common in Southern traditions. As the closing phrase, it typically returns to the tonic note and may quote the opening melody for circular structure.
